$ A$ and $ B$ together can do a job in $ 2$ days; $ B$ and $ C$ can do it in four days; and $ A$ and $ C$ in $ 2\frac{2}{5}$ days.  The number of days required for $ A$ to do the job alone is:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 1 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 3 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 6 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 12 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 2.8$
